sorular.soru: How fast are you allowed to drive here?

feedback.metin: The H-1 sign indicates that you are entering a built-up area where a speed limit of 50 km/h usually applies. In this case, there is an A-1 sign under the H-1 sign, indicating a deviating speed limit of 70 km/h. After this sign combination, the applicable speed limit is therefore 70 km/h.

sorular.soru: What is the maximum height of this passenger car including bicycles?

feedback.metin: A passenger car including load should not exceed 4 metres in height.
